meta.title: About Us | Christ Is The Answer
meta.description: Learn about the history, mission, vision and values of Christ Is The Answer. Over 55 years transforming lives in Bolivia and South America.

hero.label: OUR STORY
hero.title: Christ Is The
hero.subtitle: Since 1969, bringing hope and transforming lives in Bolivia and all of South America

mission.label: OUR MISSION
mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To restore people to the faith of the apostolic fathers, instructing believers in peace, the love of God, fellowship and respect for others.

vision.label: OUR VISION
vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be a network of united churches that positively impacts society, combining eternal salvation with a dignified Christian life in the present, transforming entire communities with the love of Christ.

history.label: OUR JOURNEY
history.title: History of Faith
history.subtitle: More than five decades of service, miracles and spiritual transformation

arrival.title: Arrival in Bolivia
arrival.description: On September 18, 1969 at 6 PM, a couple of newly graduated missionaries arrived in Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia, obeying the divine calling.

firstService.title: First Service
firstService.description: On September 24 they began preaching in the "El Lazareto" neighborhood under a Tururé tree. The message of Christ began to resonate.

firstMiracle.title: First Miracle
firstMiracle.description: Raquel de Orías was healed from spondylosis, becoming the first messenger of God's power in the nascent congregation.

expansion.title: Regional Expansion
expansion.description: The missionary work spread throughout northern Bolivia, eventually reaching Peru, Brazil, Chile, Argentina and Paraguay.

legal.title: Legal Recognition
legal.description: On September 8, 1978, the church obtained its official recognition through Supreme Resolution No. 188425 from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

present.title: Present and Future
present.description: With international headquarters in Santa Cruz de la Sierra, the church continues its mission to restore faith and transform lives throughout South America.

values.label: WHAT DEFINES US
values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: Fundamental principles that guide our faith and actions

faith.title: Faith
faith.description: Absolute trust in God and His word. We believe in the Trinity, in Jesus Christ as the physical manifestation of God, and in salvation through personal faith.

love.title: Love
love.description: God's love as the foundation of all our actions. We love our neighbor and serve the entire community with compassion.

service.title: Service
service.description: Following Christ's example, we serve others with humility and dedication, seeking the spiritual and material welfare of our community.

unity.title: Unity
unity.description: A network of churches united in purpose and vision, working together to extend God's kingdom throughout South America.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We live with honesty and transparency, respecting civil laws and maintaining exemplary conduct in all areas of our lives.

hope.title: Hope
hope.description: We proclaim hope in the second coming of Christ and the establishment of His kingdom of peace, inspiring others with this eternal promise.

principles.label: OUR FOUNDATIONS
principles.title: Doctrinal Principles
principles.subtitle: The spiritual, moral and civic foundations that govern our faith and conduct

trinity.title: The Trinity
trinity.item1: We believe in one true God, manifested in three persons: Father, Son and Holy Spirit.
trinity.item2: Jesus Christ is God made flesh, the visible manifestation of the invisible God.

salvation.title: Salvation
salvation.item1: Salvation is by grace through faith in Jesus Christ.
salvation.item2: Every human being needs repentance and personal conversion.
salvation.item3: Water baptism is by immersion, in the name of Jesus.

holySpirit.title: The Holy Spirit
holySpirit.item1: We believe in the baptism of the Holy Spirit with the evidence of speaking in other tongues.
holySpirit.item2: The gifts of the Holy Spirit are active for the church today.

secondComing.title: Second Coming
secondComing.item1: We believe in the literal and visible second coming of Jesus Christ.
secondComing.item2: The establishment of the millennial kingdom of peace and justice.

family.title: The Family
family.item1: Marriage is the sacred union between a man and a woman.
family.item2: Children are a heritage from the Lord and must be raised in His ways.
family.item3: The home is the fundamental foundation of society.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.item1: We live with honesty and transparency in all areas.
integrity.item2: We reject all forms of corruption and deceit.
integrity.item3: Our word must be our commitment.

love.title: Love for Others
love.item1: We serve those in need without distinction of race, creed or condition.

respect.title: Respect for Authorities
respect.item1: We respect and obey the civil laws of each country where we operate.
respect.item3: We fulfill our tax and legal obligations.

citizenship.title: Responsible Citizenship
citizenship.item2: We promote peace and harmonious coexistence.
citizenship.item3: We contribute to the welfare of our communities.

transparency.title: Institutional Transparency
transparency.item1: Our organization operates with complete financial transparency.
transparency.item2: We are accountable to our members and competent authorities.

stats.label: OUR IMPACT
stats.title: Transforming Lives
stats.quote: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

cta.label: JOIN US
cta.title: Become Part of Our Family
cta.description: We invite you to get to know us better. Visit one of our congregations and discover how Christ can transform your life.
